text: @Jim_Jordan Republicans hill to die on...deny it at all cost. If you deny it like the Coronavirus it will go away with the warm weather. If you say it’s a hoax or lie and say it’s not true even if it’s true, it’s a lie. Wash, rinse and repeat.
